title: 7.2.4 Implement RDSScanner with rules
body:
## Parent Issue
#30 - 7.2 Security Scanner Engine

## Objective
Implement RDS security scanner with encryption, public access rules.

## Rules
- RDS_001: Instance Publicly Accessible (Critical)
- RDS_002: Storage Not Encrypted (High)
- RDS_003: Backup Retention < 7 Days (Medium)
- RDS_004: Multi-AZ Not Enabled (Medium)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/rds.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/scanners/rules/rds_rules.py`

## Estimated Time: 2.5 hours
